name: Jumpy Legs
description:
Enter the world of a professional swimmer turn professional all star athlete, how far will you make it through the world?

RUN JUMPY, RUN!!

Below are worldwide stats for all to see, try to beat the top score and compete with friends alike!
http://stats.astrobeargames.com/?game=Jumpy%20Legs

Jumpy Legs was made purely for fun and for a laugh, we surely hope everyone manages to laugh somewhere in this game.

Have a fantasiculicious time <3
